did.unittitle: ILR School Frontlash/Committee on Labor Action International Paper Company Recruiting Protest Leaflets,

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR)

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Materials relating to a protest against the International Paper Company's recruiting efforts at the ILR School.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of materials relating to a protest against the International Paper Company's recruiting efforts at the ILR School. Included are an information packet for faculty and ILR students, leaflets, and an update on the International Paper Boycott. The protest was organized by Frontlash/Committee on Labor Action.

controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
